FileFormat.FormatDescription: Q&A was a database and word processing software program for IBM PC-compatible computers published by Symantec and partners from 1985 to 1998. Due to their age, Q&A files may lack an extension.
FileFormat.ProvenanceName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: BOF: TBWP or TBTX, followed by null. TB stands for TouchBase, Symantec's original internal name for the product. WP = Word Processor including header/footer. TX = Text only. Format is described here: https://books.google.co.uk/books?id=YfkUKcyI7KIC&pg=PT439

BOF: TBWP or TBTX, followed by null. TB stands for TouchBase, Symantec's original internal name for the product. WP = Word Processor including header/footer. TX = Text only. Format is described here: https://books.google.co.uk/books?id=YfkUKcyI7KIC&pg=PT439
